de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.manager

Interface ImManager<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the managed type (e.g. IMC or IMV)
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcManager, ImvManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractImManager, DefaultImcManager, DefaultImvManager

    public interface ImManager<T>
    Generic IM(C/V) manager baser to manage the IM(C/V) life cycle.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long add(T im)
      Adds an IM(C/V) with the manager and initializes it.
      Map<Long,T> getManaged()
      Returns a list of managed IM(C/V).
      void remove(long primaryId)
      Removes and unloads an IM(C/V) with the given primary ID from the manager.
      void reportSupportedMessagesTypes(T im, Set<de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType> types)
      Reports the component types, the given IM(C/V) is interested in.
      long reserveAdditionalId(T im)
      Requests an additional ID for the given IM(C/V) from the manager.
      void terminate()
      Terminates the manager and all managed IM(C/V).

    • Method Detail

      • add

        long add(T im)
         throws ImInitializeException
        Adds an IM(C/V) with the manager and initializes it.
        Parameters:
        im - the IM(C/V) to register
        Returns:
        the assigned primary ID for the IM(C/V)
        Throws:
        ImInitializeException - if initialization fails

      • remove

        void remove(long primaryId)
        Removes and unloads an IM(C/V) with the given primary ID from the manager.
        Parameters:
        primaryId - the primary IM(C/V) ID

      • getManaged

        Map<Long,T> getManaged()
        Returns a list of managed IM(C/V).
        Returns:
        a list of IM(C/V)

      • reserveAdditionalId

        long reserveAdditionalId(T im)
                         throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Requests an additional ID for the given IM(C/V) from the manager.
        Parameters:
        im - the IM(C/V)
        Returns:
        the additional ID
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if no additional ID is available

      • reportSupportedMessagesTypes

        void reportSupportedMessagesTypes(T im,
                                Set<de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType> types)
                                  throws de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException
        Reports the component types, the given IM(C/V) is interested in.
        Parameters:
        im - the IM(C/V)
        types - the supported component types
        Throws:
        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.exception.TncException - if the registration of supported component types fails

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        Terminates the manager and all managed IM(C/V).
